service.name: Lash Lift & Tint

seo.title: Lash Lift & Tint in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Wake-up-and-go lashes with a gentle lift and custom tint. Results last ~6–8 weeks with low maintenance.

overview.p1: A gentle lift and tint open the eyes and deepen lash color for a mascara-like look without the effort.
overview.p2: Low-maintenance results last weeks; we’ll share simple care tips to keep the curl and color fresh.

whyReluxe.title: Customized curl
whyReluxe.body: We match the lift to your lash length and eye shape.

whyReluxe.title: Tint just right
whyReluxe.body: Depth that reads natural in daylight and photos.

whyReluxe.title: Care that lasts
whyReluxe.body: Clear aftercare for 6–8 weeks of easy mornings.

service.tagline: Open your eyes with curled, tinted lashes.

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

items.heading: Care
items.body: Keep dry first 24 hrs; avoid oil-based products.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
